generatedTitle: what was the role of a slave foreman in roman society

extractFactDictList.question: What type of farm was the slave overseer?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The role of a slave foreman or overseer on a Roman farm was primarily to ensure the timely production of crops.

extractFactDictList.question: In what ancient city were the majority of the people engaged in agriculture?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In the context of ancient Rome, the majority of the people ruled by Rome were engaged in agriculture.
